tool.name: UMIs to Header

param.name: five_prime_UMI_length
param.label: Number of UMI bases at the 5' end

param.name: three_prime_UMI_length
param.label: Number of UMI bases at the 3' end)

tool.help: fastq/fastq.gz are input files with reads containing UMIs (already demultiplexed and adapters are removed). The output of the script is fastq/fastq.gz file where UMIs (7nt in total, 5'NN and 3'NNNNN preceding barcode consisting of 5nt) are in header of the read. It is designed for protocol: McGlincy NJ, Ingolia NT. Transcriptome-wide measurement of translation by ribosome profiling. Methods. 2017;126:112-129. doi:10.1016/j.ymeth.2017.05.028
